content:
Thanks for providing the link. Here is your custom GPT-3 prompt:

"Write a persuasive scientific article, with a minimum of 2000 words, on the relationship between positive psychology and increasing resilience in teenagers and children. Emphasize the technique of accepting reality as it is and acting in the moment, and support the argument using credible scientific sources and the link provided (<https://www.pathwayscoaching.com.au/21-ways-to-build-resilience-using-positive-psychology/>). The article should be written in an academic style, following APA guidelines."
